_comments.max_rounds: Maximum number of collaboration rounds before fallback to majority vote
_comments.consensus_threshold: Fraction of agents that must agree for consensus (1.0 = unanimous, 0.5 = majority)
_comments.parallel_execution: Whether agents should work in parallel (true) or sequentially (false)
_comments.check_update_frequency: How often agents check for updates in seconds (default: 3.0)
